1.cn: 装备战术物品后，干员们会根据不同情况<@gd.key>自动使用战术物品</>。
1.en: Operators will automatically use <@gd.key>equipped tacticals</> according to the situation.

10.cn: 采集所得的材料可以通过<@gd.key>简易制作</>或集成工业系统加工成各种产物，帮助探索和战斗。
10.en: Use <@gd.key>Crafting</> or AIC Factory facilities to process gathered materials into products that are useful for exploration and combat.

11.cn: <@gd.key>作战设备</>可辅助管理员战斗，在工业技术里研发更强力的作战设备吧。
11.en: <@gd.key>Combat facilities</> offer support in battle, Endministrator. Research AIC Factory technologies to get their blueprints and upgrades.

12.cn: 在<@gd.key>恰当的时机成功闪避</>敌人的攻击后，可以返还一部分闪避时消耗的体力并恢复少量技力。
12.en: <@gd.key>Successfully dodging the enemy's attack at the right timing</> restores some of the Stamina spent by the dodge and recovers some SP.

13.cn: <@gd.key>冲刺或闪避</>后，短时间内继续进攻会衔接上一段普通攻击。
13.en: For a short period after <@gd.key>dashing or dodging</>, the next basic attack performed will continue from the previous sequence.

14.cn: 部分敌人的攻击可以通过<@gd.key>跳跃</>来躲避。
14.en: Some enemy attacks can be evaded by <@gd.key>jumping</>.

15.cn: 强力的敌人通常拥有<@gd.key>失衡节点</>，当失衡值到达失衡节点时，其行为会立即被打断。
15.en: Strong enemies usually have <@gd.key>Stagger Nodes</>. Build up enough Stagger to reach the Stagger Nodes to interrupt these enemies.

16.cn: 干员对敌人<@gd.key>处决</>的动作期间，不会受到任何伤害。
16.en: Operators will not take any DMG when performing <@gd.key>Finishers</> on enemies.

17.cn: 当干员提升至一定等级后可以进行<@gd.key>精英化</>。干员的精英化阶段越高，所获得的能力越强。
17.en: Operators can be <@gd.key>promoted</> to higher elite ranks when they reach a certain level. Higher ranked operators also have stronger skills.

18.cn: 和过高等级的敌人战斗是一项严峻的挑战。如果战斗遇到困难，不妨去提升一下干员们的等级吧。
18.en: Fighting enemies many levels above you will be a challenge. If battles get too difficult, take the time to level up your operators instead.

19.cn: 晋升干员的<@gd.key>精英化阶段</>，可解锁干员的<@gd.key>技能等级上限</>。记得去提升干员的技能等级吧。
19.en: <@gd.key>Promote operators</> to unlock <@gd.key>higher skill level caps</>. Don't forget to level up the skills of promoted operators.

2.cn: <@gd.key>穿戴装备</>能够<@gd.key>显著提高干员的属性</>，提升作战能力。
2.en: <@gd.key>Equip gear</> to <@gd.key>significantly improve the operator's stats</> and combat capabilities.

20.cn: <@gd.key>升级武器</>，可提高武器基础攻击力；<@gd.key>突破武器</>，可提升武器等级上限与武器技能等级。
20.en: <@gd.key>Upgrade a weapon</> to raise its Base Attack. <@gd.key>Tune the weapon</> to raise its level cap and weapon skill level.

21.cn: 干员也会受到来自敌人的<@gd.key>法术异常</>（燃烧、冻结、导电、腐蚀）效果，一些战术物品可以快速清除异常效果。
21.en: Enemies can also apply <@gd.key>Arts Reaction</> debuffs (Combustion, Solidification, Electrification, and Corrosion) on operators. Some tacticals are designed to quickly remove these debuffs.

22.cn: 若在战斗中需要<@gd.key>保护和治疗，</>管理员可以尝试在队伍里<@gd.key>编入“重装”或“辅助”职业干员。</>
22.en: Assign operators with <@gd.key>defender or supporter</> roles in the team as they offer <@gd.key>protection and HP treatment</> during combat, Endministrator.

23.cn: 若常常感觉<@gd.key>技力</>捉襟见肘，管理员可以尝试在队伍里<@gd.key>编入“先锋”职业干员。</>
23.en: If the team is always short on <@gd.key>Skill Points (SP)</>, try assigning operators with <@gd.key>vanguard</> roles for faster SP recovery.

24.cn: <@gd.key>合理地把技力分配给不同的干员</>，通常比反复施放相同战技的效果更佳。
24.en: Try to <@gd.key>distribute SP usage amongst different operators</>. This is often more effective than repeatedly casting the same battle skill.

3.cn: 不同干员<@gd.key>连携技</>的触发条件不同，多多了解会让战斗事半功倍。
3.en: Different operators have different <@gd.key>combo skill</> triggers. Know these triggers to make battles easier.

4.cn: 穿戴多件<@gd.key>同一套装类型</>的装备后，能够激活装备<@gd.key>套组效果</>，为干员提供额外的战斗能力。
4.en: Equip multiple pieces of gear from the <@gd.key>same set</> to activate <@gd.key>set effects</> that further boost your operator's combat performance.

5.cn: 干员的<@gd.key>重击</>攻击既能造成失衡，又能恢复技力。多多利用会使战斗更加轻松。
5.en: Try to complete basic attack sequences. The last sequence, <@gd.key>Final Strike</>, deals Stagger and restores SP.

6.cn: 敌人在<@gd.key>蓄力</>时（身体周围出现红色圈特效时）十分脆弱，使用技能将其打断能对敌人造成重创。
6.en: Enemies will be exposed when they are <@gd.key>charging up</> for a skill (indicated by the shrinking red circle). Interrupt them with a skill to deal heavy damage.

7.cn: 穿戴多件同一套装类型的装备后，能够激活装备套装效果，为干员提供额外的战斗能力。
7.en: Equip multiple pieces of gear from the same set to activate set effects that further boost your operator's combat performance.

8.cn: 获得装备制造模板后即制造对应装备，大部分模板可通过提升权限等阶获取，少部分需要通过世界探索发现。
8.en: Collect gear templates to assemble new pieces of gear. Most templates can be acquired by raising your Authority Level. Others might be found by exploring the world.

9.cn: <@gd.key>干员晋升和技能升级</>所需要的部分珍贵材料只能通过<@gd.key>采集或在帝江号培养舱培养</>获得。
9.en: Certain rare materials for <@gd.key>operator promotion and skill upgrades</> can only be <@gd.key>gathered or cultivated at the OMV Dijiang Growth Chamber</>.
